name: Agent Preview File
summary: Learn about .ACG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Agent is a program that came preinstalled with Windows 98 through Windows Vista, but Microsoft discontinued it when it released Windows 8. The program featured animated characters that would interact with the user to help them better understand the operating system or assist them through issues.

description: An ACG file contains a character preview created for Microsoft Agent, an interactive assistant program. It stores a preview image of a custom or preinstalled character (saved in an .ACS file) that appears on the screen to assist Windows users. ACG files are typically saved with their corresponding ACS files for which they store the preview.

instructions: ACG files are not meant to be manually opened. Instead, Microsoft Agent references the file when loading the preview of a character.
